section.title: Introduction
section.para: We're happy for people to experiment with Poky and there are a number of places to find help if you run into difficulties or find bugs. To find out how to download source code see the Obtaining Poky section of the Introduction.

section.title: Bugtracker
section.para: Problems with Poky should be reported in the bug tracker.

section.title: Mailing list
section.para: To subscribe to the mailing list send mail to:
Then follow the simple instructions in subsequent reply. Archives are available here.

listitem.para: OpenEmbedded - The upstream generic embedded distribution Poky derives from (and contributes to).
Bitbake - The tool used to process Poky metadata.
Pimlico - A suite of lightweight Personal Information Management (PIM) applications designed primarily for handheld and mobile devices.
QEMU - An open source machine emulator and virtualizer.
